content: Hi All. Going forward, from Connectathon 28 and beyond, this thread will be used for all Gravity Connectathons. For Connectathon 28, the track page can be found here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021-09+Gravity+SDOH+Exchange
Hi All. For Connectathon 29, the track page can be found here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2022-01+Gravity+SDOH+Exchange
